about_the_game:
In BattleCore Arena, you will compete in fast-paced PvP battles with responsive controls that mix shooting, platforming, physics mastery, and team strategy! With your team, dash, jump (and double jump), and use your trusted weapons and abilities to eject your opponents out of the arena.

Enjoy different 3v3 modes with your friends or play alone in a free-for-all battle to be the last core standing!



Download and play for free now!

MASTER PHYSICS


Physics will be your greatest ally or your worst enemy! Perform mind-blowing aerial maneuvers and mix the jump, double jump, directional dash, and gravity to take the upper hand!

DOMINATE THE ARENA


Experience three unique battle modes to fight with your team or roll against them:
- BACKUP: Be the last team standing in this 3v3 Team Death Match where you share lives with your teammates.
- Q-BALL: Catch and keep the Q-Ball to lead your team to victory. Teamwork will be key in this highly competitive mode.
- FREE-FOR-ALL: Warm up in a free-for-all match and be the last core standing!

BUILD YOUR OWN CORE


Personalize the appearance of your core! Choose your Armor, customize your Lights, your Banner, and your Elimination Explosion to impose your style in and out the arena.

You can count on unique weapons and abilities to be the most powerful core of the arena. Gear up for upcoming battles and create your own playstyle by choosing a ranged weapon and game-changer perks!

ROLL WITH OR AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS

Build a team and feel the competitive energy of the game. Join ranked matches and compete against teams at your level. From bronze to diamond, you will rise above the sun and unlock incredible rewards!

name: BattleCore Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 3.4 GHz, Ryzen5 1400 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD RX 5500XT (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K 3.7 GHz, AMD Ryzen 5 2600 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660TI (6GB) or AMD RX 5600XT (6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: BattleCore Arena is a free to play competitive platform shooter where gravity mastery is the key to victory. Use your trusted weapons and abilities to eject your opponents out of the arena in style. Glory awaits you, take the plunge!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
